name: Roblox Milk (DEAD-ish)
description:
A milky-toned theme for Roblox based on saving screen space and miscellaneous eye candy. Meant for use on Roblox Forums; I'll try to tweak it for the rest of the main site but that part is no where near being complete.

(Works best with Firefox, I don't use Chromide so I'm mostly unaware of problems that that group of users face)

(I slowed down my activity on Roblox Forums a lot but I still occasionally come on and therefore still occasionally make tweaks to this style)
obsoletion_message: gaijin piggu no want gloriosu firefox web based free as in freedom browsing machine
additional_info: Thanks to Teh Pwnerers for all the kindness and support, we love you guys! [[Minor update: made Alert banners look a little nicer and more in-sync with the style]]
